text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
The practice was very basic, but
you two are starting to be on the
same wavelength! However …

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
I don't believe a trainer who puts their
Uma first would stop here. I'll be sure
to check out your next training …!
